1_1Ad65ppm6jjuP1rzFTQZRGzBHVGWk8EcyA.body: Are you planning to add more size options to each movie. 9Gb 1080p versions might seem a bit high to some, i understand why some people would prefer those versions though.

> [void](#comment_4_1Ad65ppm6jjuP1rzFTQZRGzBHVGWk8EcyA): Currently for SD and 720p it prefer smaller sizes, for 1080p bigger sizes (up to 8GB). If you click on source: rarbg it lists the other versions on rarbg. (served on clearnet)

Would it make sense to add a site-wide preference of file sizes? Not entirely specific but like a quality vs size slider? Love the simplicity of the site though and can understand if you feel it would break the simplicity.
